name: Hat of Wizardry
description:
Wondrous Item (Requires Attunement by a Wizard). This antiquated, cone-shaped hat is adorned with gold crescent moons and stars. While you are wearing it, you gain the following benefits:

Arcane Focus. You can use the hat as a Spellcasting Focus for your Wizard spells.

Unknown Cantrips. When you cast a Wizard cantrip that you don't know, you can use the hat to attempt to cast it. Make a DC 10 Intelligence (Arcana) check. On a successful check, you cast the spell. On a failed check, the spell fails and the action used to cast the spell is wasted.
